EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data Science Tech Workshops_Q3-416.Confirmation - R+V
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed for Data Science Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You are now registered for the Pivotal Data Science Technical Workshop at R+V.
Date & Location Wednesday, October 26th, 2016 8h30 to 12h30
R+V Heidenkampsweg 102 20097 Hamburg
Questions? If you have a question about the workshop, please contact us at events@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you at the workshop.
Best Regards, Pivotal Data Science Team
